Configuration.StudyNameEntrez: Whole-Genome and Exome Sequencing in Clear-Cell Renal Cell Carcinoma
Configuration.StudyNameReportPage: Whole-Genome and Exome Sequencing in clear-cell Renal Cell Carcinoma (ccRCC)
Configuration.Description: Study to evaluate the molecular genetics of ccRCC through integrative analyses of tumors and tumorgrafts using multiple platforms in clinically annotated samples. Genome and exome data for patients giving consent to have the information available on a public, secure, database is being submitted.

Configuration.StudyHistory:
1. Whole-Genome sequencing of a ccRCC tumor/normal pair
  2. Exome Sequencing for a ccRCC tumor/normal pair
  3. Exome Sequencing for a ccRCC tumor/metastasis/normal trio

ParticipantSet.UseLimitation: Use of the data is limited to research purposes only.
